### Phase 1b - SEO Infrastructure âœ… COMPLETE

**Generated Files:**
- `src/constants/seoKeywords.ts` - Keyword strategy (The Big 10 categories, age-group targeting)
- `src/lib/seo.ts` - Meta tag generation functions (generateHomepageMeta, generateProductPageMeta, generateBlogArticleMeta)
- `public/schema-homepage.json` - Structured data (Schema.org Organization, WebSite, LocalBusiness)
- `src/components/SEO/MetaTags.tsx` - React component for dynamic meta tag injection
- `index.html` - Updated with SEO tags, schema.org scripts, FTC disclosure

**Features:**
- âœ… Keyword targeting: "Best [Supplement] for [Age] [Health Goal]"
- âœ… Schema.org support (Organization, WebSite, Product schemas)
- âœ… Open Graph & Twitter Card tags
- âœ… FTC affiliate disclosure compliance
- âœ… Multi-language preparation (EN, FR)

## ðŸ›  TECH STACK USED

- **Frontend:** React 18 + TypeScript

- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **AI Development:** Google Gemini 2.5-flash via Antigravity

- **Version Control:** Git + GitHub
- **CI/CD:** GitHub Actions
- **Hosting:** Hostinger (FTP deployment)
